frame.name: Vehicle_subpart
frame.definition: <def-root>An entity is integrated into a vehicle as a <fen>Part</fen> of a (possibly unexpressed) <fen>Whole</fen> which may refer to the whole vehicle or merely to a sub-part of the vehicle. <ex></ex> <ex>The <fex name="Whole">car's</fex> <fex name="Part"><t>engine</t></fex> started smoking so we pulled over.</ex> <ex>Put the bags in the <fex name="Part"><t>trunk</t></fex>.</ex> <ex>One should always wear a <fex name="Part"><t>seatbelt</t></fex> while driving.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition: <def-root>Some <fex name="Part">Part</fex> of the larger vehicle, the <fex name="Whole">Whole</fex>. </def-root>

FE.name: Whole
FE.definition: <def-root>A vehicle (the <fex name="Whole">Whole</fex>) which includes the <fex name="Part">Part</fex>. </def-root>

FE.name: Function
FE.definition: <def-root>The function of the part within the vehicule as a whole. </def-root>

FE.name: Orientation
FE.definition: <def-root>This property of the part that situates the part within the whole. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: voorruit.n
lexUnit.definition: in de voorzijde van een auto
